channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Slickr Flickr
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Slickr Flickr

item.title: CVE-2022-3021|2024-08-03T00:52:59.860Z -- unknown -- slickr%20flickr
item.description: The Slickr Flickr WordPress plugin through 2.8.1 does not sanitise and escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
